original_text: and to Isaac I gave Jacob and Esau. I assigned the hill country of Seir to Esau, but Jacob and his family went down to Egypt.
korean_text: 이삭에게는 야곱과 에서를 주었고 에서에게는 세일 산을 소유로 주었으나 야곱과 그의 자손들은 애굽으로 내려갔으므로

sentences.original_text: and to Isaac I gave Jacob and Esau
I assigned the hill country of Seir to Esau
but Jacob and his family went down to Egypt
